### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE research_trends (
  research_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  research_topic TEXT,
  research_keywords TEXT[]
)

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM research_trends WHERE research_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE research_trends (
  research_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  research_topic TEXT,
  research_keywords TEXT[]
)

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM research_trends WHERE research_topic = 'Machine Learning';

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE research_trends (
  research_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  research_topic TEXT,
  research_keywords TEXT[]
)

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM research_trends WHERE research_keywords @> ARRAY['AI'];

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE research_trends (
  research_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  research_topic TEXT,
  research_keywords TEXT[]
)

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM research_trends WHERE research_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE research_trends (
  research_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  research_topic TEXT,
  research_keywords TEXT[]
)

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM research_trends WHERE research_topic = 'Machine Learning' AND ARRAY['deep learning', 'natural language processing'] <@ research_keywords

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE research_trends (
  research_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  research_topic TEXT,
  research_keywords TEXT[]
)

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM research_trends WHERE research_id IN (SELECT research_id FROM research_trends WHERE research_topic ILIKE '%AI%')
